title: When you get an S for a game you lost

replies.body: Happens every time I play Support Jinx.

y r u playing support jinx
r u okay

> [{quoted}](name=Hello I am Bird,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=Kw03EqGL,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-06-25T15:43:20.762+0000)
>
> y r u playing support jinx
> r u okay

She's a solid C+ support. Not good enough to take in ranked, not bad enough to drop entirely.

You've got good poke with Q and W, peel with W/E, and an ult that scales with enemy missing hp -- works no matter how little gold you have.

My brother and i get bored and run a Draven Jinx bot lane every now and then for fun.

works really well because enemies dont know which adc to focus and no matter who gets jump we can peel and do damage.
so this means that...jinx is a good support....until it's time to win the game. Good at  playing for herself, bad at helping the team.

> [{quoted}](name=ALthaGreat,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=Kw03EqGL,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2016-06-25T16:11:32.699+0000)
>
> so this means that...jinx is a good support....until it's time to win the game. Good at  playing for herself, bad at helping the team.

Jinx is good at taking kills and farming while their poor lane partner is dead.  And would never build support items like sight stone.   This way the Jinx can preserve their KDA despite how well the team does.
Well it takes averages and Im guessing the average scores for support jinx are pretty low so it doesn't take much
https://media.giphy.com/media/wAt7yLLY0XdRe/giphy.gif
had a game in ranked with 4 ppl on my team getting an S and still no win... feelsbadman
When you get an S+*
done that 4 times.

Watchout guys

http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-DK3UQwP7DKQ/Tw4pqZBilQI/AAAAAAAAAm0/tCgFmiUgDRs/s1600/neil-degrasse-tyson-badass-gif.gif

jk jk
And then you get an A for carrying and doing the best on the winning team
And the one person that does get an S on your team is like 12/10/4. Had that happen before.

Reminds me of when you get an S- on Zilean. But it is on ARAM, and you don't own him. So despite not choosing to play him you don't get a box, and are left with 9 keys and no boxes still. Because you only ever solo queue.{{item:3151}}
{{champion:104}}  or when it happens with this guy. No box, no cigar..... c'mon rito.

{{item:3070}} every. damn. time

How does this explain the feeling perfectly

You can't put it into words, but this gif sums it up perfectly
Mandatory:team 2 heavy

I got my second lvl7 mastery token for Thresh from a loss.
Sad from loss, happy from token.
